name: Available or Leased Shop at Airport
query:
select airport as "Airport",
count(case when status = 'Availbale' then 1 end) as "Available Shop",
count(case when status = 'Leased' then 0 end) as "Leased Shop",
count(name) as "Total Shop"
from `tabShop`
group by airport;
report_name: Available or Leased Shop at Airport
